definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
classifier for horses, mules etc/Taiwan pr. [pi1]/ordinary person/classifier for cloth: bolt/horsepower

sentences.chinese: 在中國，刀和布匹被當作錢用。

sentences.english: They unrolled the cloth onto the table.
sentences.chinese: 他們在桌上把布匹拉開。

sentences.english: We want to buy Accessories, Buttons, Zippers , Cloth, Clothes, Chocolates.
sentences.chinese: 我們要採購配件，鈕釦，拉鍊，布匹，衣服，巧克力。

sentences.english: All his fairy daughters could weave beautiful clothes.
sentences.chinese: 這七個女兒個個都能織美麗的布匹。

sentences.english: He observed that any flaw in the fabric rolls caused it to be sold for scrap.
sentences.chinese: 他觀察到布匹上任何一個瑕疵都會使整卷布報廢。

sentences.english: The piece goods are to be wrapped in Kraft paper, then packed in wooden cases.
sentences.chinese: 布匹在裝入木箱以前要用牛皮紙包好。

sentences.english: Tile salesman cut a large piece from the cloth.
sentences.chinese: 售貨員從布匹上截下一大塊。

sentences.english: The Indians bartered furs for guns and cloths.
sentences.chinese: 印第安人用毛皮換取槍支和布匹。

sentences.english: Please concentrate on theprintingwith our cloth sample we sent to you.
sentences.chinese: 請把注意力集中在我們寄給貴司的布匹樣品的印花上。

sentences.english: I got these from fabric sample books that were discarded by our local window-covering shop.
sentences.chinese: 我從附近的窗飾店裏要來了廢棄的布匹樣布圖冊。

sentences.english: In china, cloth and knives were used as money.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，刀和布匹被當作錢用。

definition: cloth and silk/cotton and silk textiles
item made from woven silk or rayon
produced locally/local product (with distinctive native features)
